Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory28.jpg'}
{3: 'The supply transfer has been arranged after the routine security check at the outpost to conceal the actual objective of this operation.'}
{3: 'The desert in winter is still remarkably arid. The sea of yellow sand in front of you has not changed apart from the cooling weather.'}
{2: 'How far have I traveled in this desert...', 3: '6'}
{3: 'Your vehicle raises a fog of dust as it glides through the desert, and the sand dispersed in the air like a fleeting cloud.'}
{3: "Today is New Year's Eve. Despite having no notion of festivities, you still feel odd traveling alone on this day."}
{2: 'System', 3: 'Incoming transmission—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "Hello? Don't tell me you've fallen asleep, 【kuroname】? Our tracking suggested that you've entered the safe area, but you should keep an eye out nonetheless.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm awake.", 3: '13', 4: 'Keep an eye out?', 5: '13'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "I know we're working with the Forsaken for now, but you can never tell what sort of accidents could happen down there. Just be careful.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I will. Don't worry.", 3: '15'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "Good to hear that. After all, the Gray Ravens aren't by your side this time, and they're all worried sick...", 4: '1'}
{2: "Let them know I'm safe and sound, will you?", 3: '17'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "I will. Make sure to keep your comms open and keep tabs on the cruise control. You're about two kilometers from the meeting point. Safe travels!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: "As Celica's message ends, you are immediately connected with the Forsaken."}
{3: 'It follows so swiftly that you cannot help but wonder if they have been trying to call you when Celica was occupying the line.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You're in Forsaken territory now, 【kuroname】. Maintain your speed. Our envoy will be meeting you at your nine o'clock.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Keep to yourself. We don't need no attention.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You see a layer of white mist fogging up the window of the cockpit. The setting sun lingers on the golden horizon, and everything seems within reach.'}
{3: 'The visible heatwave rises from the sand, distorting and refracting light, and you can see the dunes transforming into a pot of molten gold.'}
{3: 'Your transport slowly enters the designated area. You can see the paved path ahead of you as your vehicle gradually stops bumping.'}
{3: "The Forsaken soldiers stop your ride under Watanabe's lead."}
{3: 'You have yet to enter the campsite proper, unlike what you were expecting. You can tell it is still quite a distance away just from the view on your ride.'}
{3: 'Uncertain about the current situation, you recall what Celica mentioned and prepare for any unforeseen arrangement.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory26.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You're 47 minutes and 6 seconds late.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Have you been waiting here?', 3: '38', 4: 'The journey here took a while...', 5: '39'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Consider this part of my "goodwill." I did promise to guarantee your safety.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Not surprising. It's a rough neighborhood.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Sorry for not informing you beforehand, but we'll need you to stop here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "For the sake of both of our sides, I can't allow a Babylonia vessel to enter our camp directly. It's an inconvenient time—you'll understand once you arrive.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "But you don't have to worry. No harm will come to you. The Forsaken does not forget the people who fought by our side.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I understand.', 3: '44'}
{3: 'Watanabe nods and gestures to the soldiers around him, and a senior-looking guard walks up with a detection device.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Guard Leader', 3: 'Pardon me. Please raise your arms—', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Your pistol, as well as your emergency fire starter kit, are both confiscated.'}
{2: 'Guard Leader', 3: 'My apologies. No fire-starting items are allowed in the camp, and... what is this?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'A water bottle... obviously?', 3: '51'}
{2: 'Guard Leader', 3: "Would you mind taking a sip in front of us now? If it's alcohol...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Enough, no need to be so thorough. Babylonia's not gonna allow a commandant to drink on the job, and this one doesn't seem like the rule-breaking kind.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Have you notified the folks in the camp?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Guard Leader', 3: 'We did. Although we do recognize the Gray Raven Commandant, there have been many newcomers in the camp...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Watanabe does not answer you. He turns and signals everyone to follow him to the Forsaken base.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory31.jpg'}
{3: 'Unlike the calm and quiet campsite you remembered, the one you are seeing is bustling—'}
{3: 'The military tents by the road have turned into various stalls, where the Forsaken members trade and exchange rare items and supplies.'}
{3: 'More surprisingly, you notice a large group of children running by the Forsaken headquarter, giggling.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Guard Leader', 3: "Hey, kids! Stop running around in here! You're going to bring down the tent!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The children turn to make a funny face at the guard leader before disappearing into the crowd with a louder wave of laughter.'}
{1: '6687', 2: 'Who are they?', 3: '69', 4: 'There are kids here!', 5: '70'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Children of the Forsaken.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Don't be so surprised. This isn't our only camp, and we... are not the only ones forsaken.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'We built a small shelter to the east of here after what happened with the ARU. The kids and the newcomers are staying there.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "They should be the actual hope for the future... We couldn't abandon them.", 4: '1'}
{2: "That's why you were searching me so thoroughly...", 3: '74'}
{3: 'Watanabe stops, giving a soldier that is sorting supplies some kind of order.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zong', 3: "Mr. Watanabe! I'm sorry, the sorting is still ongoing. You might want to take this...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Supplier. A supplier for now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: 'I see! You might want to take this... "supplier" elsewhere first?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: "And don't forget to answer your comms, Mr. Watanabe. You're about to be late for the call with the blue gentleman.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You don't have to remind me. I'll reply after this—and we aren't the ones who are late, to begin with.", 4: '2'}

{3: 'The children who entered the campsite earlier are still hanging around. They shoot a glance at your side every once in a while, and Watanabe waves back with a warm, friendly smile, unlike his usual solemn self.'}
{3: 'But when he turns back at you, he looks exactly as he was.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Cough... 【kuroname】, let's talk business.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I've only received a very vague report about this test. But before that... there's something else that I'm more curious about.", 4: '1'}
{3: "At Watanabe's cue, the Forsaken soldiers open the marked cache."}
{3: "The CUB for this testing immediately activates and hovers by Watanabe's side."}
{3: 'Right now, it is just a polygon with red stripes on one side, looking quite ordinary.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'This thing can... help in a fight? It looks so...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe activates its second stage with uncertainty.'}

{3: "Its form expands and changes as it transforms to prepare for engagements. The animalistic features and coatings of the machine immediately catch the people's attention... and catch them off guard."}
{3: "Watanabe's doubtful gaze and the unexpected reveal have everyone on the scene turn silent."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I understand it's supposed to be a support unit, but isn't this design a little bit... excessive?", 4: '1'}
{2: '...', 3: '103', 4: 'There were... thoughts put into it.', 5: '104'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I assume there were specific... thoughts put into it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "If you say so... I suppose there's no harm in it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "If we're just talking about combat capabilities, it's indeed... quite...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe frowns, excruciating, desperately trying to convince himself with his own argument.'}
{2: 'System', 3: 'Incoming transmission—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'Is this a good time? Mind if I cut in?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The silence is broken up by a call from Babylonia. As the comms connect, Watanabe reverts to his typical expression.'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "I know the commandant isn't exactly on time, but our tracking shows that 【kuroname】 has arrived. And it seems that Mr. Watanabe here has a lot to say about our CUB?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "But we can table that for later—it's one of our proudest creations, after all. Asimov, it's your turn to do the talking.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "...I don't have much to say, to be honest.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Chief Technician is apparently unfamiliar with an occasion like this, or maybe he simply does not care. He pays no attention to how restless he looks.'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Please check the instructions we sent you to see how to use and connect with the "Combat Unit Booster". It\'s just a prototype, so the user experience may not be perfect, but it won\'t be lethal.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "It might just get a little uncomfortable during the connection. But that's what you get from connecting to the M.I.N.D., so just prepare yourselves.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Regarding its appearance, we have commissioned experts from the WGAA to design it, so I swear it's more than competent. Don't worry.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is that true...', 3: '123', 4: 'I guess looks can be deceiving.', 5: '123'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "In that case, I'll count on the old models—I mean, the role models of the Forsaken to carry out this test.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "This is just standard fare. It's nothing to us.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "I can tell how battle-tested you all must be from the way you've been maintaining yourselves. I simply require data from older frames.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "...It seems that Babylonia hasn't forgotten where this frame comes from.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'That... is not for me to say. Do you want me to fetch Hassen for you?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "That won't be necessary.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "No offense, but it's probably best that we keep this kind of collaboration a one-time event. Good luck.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'And the call ends there.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Patrol Leader', 3: 'Sir, is our... "supplier" clear?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Don't worry. They would have sent someone else if it was a trap.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Facing his hesitant crew, Watanabe casually gives him a pat on the shoulder.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "For my part, I trust 【kuroname】. We have to have more friends who've fought with us than enemies against us, right?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'But you, dear supplier, I do have a job for you before my men are done calibrating the machine.', 4: '2'}
